Are you sure you want to delete this con: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba iki kiganiro?
Name: Izina
temperatureDescription: Indangagaciro nini nka 0.8 zituma ibisubizo biba byiza kurushaho, mu gihe indangagaciro nto nka 0.2 zituma biba bifite intego kandi bihamye.
chatInputPlaceholderFull: Andikira MSF AI Assistant hano cyangwa wandike "/" kugira ngo uhitemo ibwiriza...
chatDisclaimer: MSF AI Assistant ashobora gukora amakosa. Reba amakuru y'ingenzi.
*Note that these default settings only a: *Menya ko izi genamiterere zisanzwe zigira ingaruka gusa ku biganiro bishya nyuma yo kubikwa.
Are you sure you want to clear all messa: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubutumwa bwose?
Chatbot UI is an advanced chatbot kit fo: Chatbot UI ni igikoresho cy'ibiganiro gifite ubushobozi bwinshi cya modeli za OpenAI kigamije gusa na ChatGPT mu buryo bwo gukoresha n'imikorere.
Higher values like 0_8 will make the out: Indangagaciro nini nka 0.8 zituma ibisubizo biba bitunguranye, mu gihe indangagaciro nto nka 0.2 zituma biba bifite intego kandi bihamye.
If you completed this step, OpenAI may b: Niba warangije iki cyiciro, OpenAI ishobora kuba ifite ibibazo.
If you don't have an OpenAI API key, you: Niba udafite urufunguzo rwa OpenAI API, ushobora kurubona hano:
Make sure your OpenAI API key is set in: Menya neza ko urufunguzo rwawe rwa OpenAI API rushyizwe mu buryo bw'ibumoso hasi mu murongo w'uruhande.
Message limit is {{maxLength}} character: Ubutumwa ntibugomba kurenza {{maxLength}} inyuguti. Wanditse {{valueLength}} inyuguti.
Please set your OpenAI API key in the bo: Nyamuneka shyira urufunguzo rwawe rwa OpenAI API mu buryo bw'ibumoso hasi mu murongo w'uruhande.
Type a message or type \"/\" to select a: Andika ubutumwa cyangwa wandike "/" kugira ngo uhitemo ibwiriza...
You are ChatGPT, a large language model: Uri ChatGPT, modeli nini y'ururimi yatojwe na OpenAI. Kurikira amabwiriza y'umukoresha neza. Subiza ukoresheje markdown.
welcomeMessage: Murakaza neza kuri MSF AI Assistant
defaultWebPullerQuestion: Nyamuneka kora incamake y'ibiri kuri iyi paji.
webPullerCitationPrompt: Erekana inkomoko y'ibyo uvuga mu mwandiko kandi werekane URL
webPullerReferencePrompt: Nanone erekana umutwe, inkomoko igaragara, umwanditsi (abawanditsi), n'itariki y'itangazwa aho bishoboka kandi bikenewe.
webPullerIconScreenReader: Kurura umwandiko wa paji kuri URL
webSearchModalPromptUserContext: Kora isesengura ryose rishyize hamwe n'icyifuzo cy'umukoresha gikurikira
webSearchModalPromptCitation: Shyira inkomoko mu gisubizo cyawe cyose. Ku iherezo ry'igisubizo cyawe tanga inkomoko zirimo buri gihe imitwe n'amahuza y'inkomoko z'ibanze, ndetse n'umwanditsi (abawanditsi) aho bishoboka.
translatorTextToTranslatePlaceholder: Andika cyangwa ushire umwandiko wawe hano
webUrlInputDescription: Andika URL ya rubuga kugira ngo AI isesengure
webUrlQuestionDescription: Ni iki ushaka kumenya kuri uru rubuga?
webSearchInputDescription: Shakisha kuri interineti ukoresheje isesengura rya AI
Are you sure you want to delete this fol: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubu bubiko?
Prompt content_ Use {{}} to denote a var: Ibikubiye mu bwiriza. Koresha '{{}}' kwerekana impinduka. Urugero: '{{name}}' ni '{{adjective}}' '{{noun}}'

title: Kwandika Amajwi/Amashusho
unsupportedFileType: Ubwoko bw'idosiye butemewe. Nyamuneka hitamo idosiye y'amajwi cyangwa amashusho.
transcriptionError: Habaye ikosa mu kwandika. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
transcriptionErrorAttempt: Ikosa mu kwandika (Umugerageze wa {attempt} mu 3). Gusubiramo...
rateLimitExceededWaiting: Umubare ntarengwa warenze. Gutegereza amasegonda {seconds} mbere yo gusubiramo...
transcriptionComplete: Ubwandiko bwarangiye! Umwandiko wongerewe mu kiganiro.
This is a set of instructions that guide: Aya ni amabwiriza ayobora AI Assistant ku buryo bwo gusubiza. Afasha AI gutanga amakuru afite akamaro kandi nyayo binyuze mu gutanga ibyerekezo ku bibazo bibajijwe.
Enter a prompt or type \"/\" to select a: Andika ibwiriza cyangwa wandike "/" kugira ngo uhitemo ibwiriza...
Add your personal instructions to custom: Ongeraho amabwiriza yawe bwite kugira ngo uhindure uburyo AI isubiza. Aya ahuzwa n'amabwiriza y'imyitwarire y'ibanze ashimisha ibisubizo bifasha, nyakuri, kandi bitagira ingaruka.
Tip: Type \"/\" to select from saved pro: Icyitonderwa: Andika "/" kugira ngo uhitemo mu mabwiriza yabitswe.
Higher values produce more creative and: Indangagaciro nini zitanga ibisubizo byiza kurushaho kandi bitandukanye, indangagaciro nto ziba zifite intego kandi zihamye.
Enable for a more natural reading experi: Fungura kugira ngo ubone uburambe bwo gusoma busanzwe
Higher values produce more creative and: Indangagaciro nini zitanga ibisubizo byiza kurushaho kandi bitandukanye, indangagaciro nto ziba zifite intego kandi zihamye.
*Note that these default settings only a: *Menya ko izi genamiterere zisanzwe zigira ingaruka gusa ku biganiro bishya nyuma yo kubikwa.
Select a prompt to view details: Hitamo ibwiriza kugira ngo urebe ibisobanuro
Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Shakisha iyi kode QR n'igikoresho cyawe cy'igendanwa kugira ngo utangire gushyiraho
Access the app directly from your home s: Koresha porogaramu mu buryo butaziguye uhereye ku cyerekanwa cyawe cy'ibanze
PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ingenzi: Ugomba gukoresha mushakisha wa Safari. Abandi bashakisha nka Chrome cyangwa Firefox ntibazakora ku gushyiraho kuri iOS.
PWA Install Tip: üí° Icyitonderwa: Shyiraho nyuma yo kwinjira kugira ngo ubike kwemeza kwawe kandi ubone uburambe bwiza.
PWA Note: Icyitonderwa: Ibi bishyiraho porogaramu ya rubuga nka Progressive Web App (PWA) ku gikoresho cyawe. Nta butikiro bwa porogaramu bukenewe!
Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Menya byinshi ku bijyanye na Progressive Web Apps
Storage almost full! Consider clearing o: Ububiko buregerejee kwuzura! Tekereza gusiba ibiganiro bishaje
Select a tone to view details: Hitamo ijwi kugira ngo urebe ibisobanuro

agents.formatDescription: Imiterere: asst_xxxxx (kuva MSF AI Assistant Foundry)
agents.importantInfo: Uyu muhagararizi azagira ububasha ku byerekezo by'ikiganiro kandi ashobora gukoresha ibikoresho bimwe na modeli zisanzwe. Menya neza ko Indangamuntu y'Umuhagararizi ari iyukuri kuko idashobora guhinduka nyuma.
agents.defunctWarning: Modeli y'ibanze y'uyu muhagararizi ntikiboneka. Hindura umuhagararizi kugira ngo uhitemo modeli nshya y'ibanze, cyangwa uyisibe.
agents.importFileDescription: Hitamo idosiye ya JSON ifite imiterere y'umuhagararizi umwe cyangwa myinshi
agents.invalidIdFormat: Imiterere y'Indangamuntu y'Umuhagararizi itemewe. Imiterere yitezwe: asst_xxxxx
agents.noAgentsInFile: Nta bahagararizi babonetse mu idosiye yinjijwe

Type / in chat to access your prompts: Andika / mu kiganiro kugira ngo ugere ku mabwiriza yawe
Type / in chat, select your prompt, and: Andika / mu kiganiro, hitamo ibwiriza ryawe, hanyuma wuzuze impinduka iyo bisabwe
Sentence length, complexity, active vs p: Uburebure bw'interuro, ikibazo cy'ubushobozi, ijwi rikora n'iritakora
Apply tones in chat via Expand Actions t: Koresha amajwi mu kiganiro binyuze mu Kugaragaza Ibikorwa kugira ngo ibisubizo byose bihure n'ijwi ushaka
prompts_conflict_message: Ibwiriza (amabwiriza) {count} bifite amazina asa nabyo birabaho: {names}. Injiza uko bimeze?
tones_conflict_message: Ijwi (amajwi) {count} bifite amazina asa nabyo birabaho: {names}. Injiza uko bimeze?

Create voice profiles for consistent wri: Kora umwirondoro w'ijwi ku buryo bwo kwandika buhamye
importBackupParseError: Gusesengura idosiye yabitswe byanze. Nyamuneka menya neza ko ari JSON yemewe.
Please select at least one item type to: Nyamuneka hitamo nibura ubwoko bumwe bw'ikintu cyo kohereza
Preferred words, phrases to use or avoid: Amagambo n'imvugo byo gukoresha cyangwa kwirinda
Save Time with Reusable Prompts: Bungabunga Igihe n'Amabwiriza Akoreshwa Inshuro Nyinshi
Turn your repetitive tasks into one-clic: Hindura imirimo yawe isubirwamo ibe amategeko y'ikanda rimwe
errorOccurredFetchingSearchResults: Habaye ikosa mu kubona ibisubizo by'ubushakashatsi
errorOccurredFetchingUrl: Habaye ikosa mu kubona ibiri kuri URL

Please provide either a description or g: Nyamuneka tanga ibisobanuro cyangwa intego yo gukora ibwiriza
noTonesAvailable:
Nta majwi aboneka.

Kora amajwi mu Bikorwa Byihuse kugira ngo ugenzure uburyo bwo kwandika, uburyo busanzwe, n'imico.
applyCustomVoiceProfile:
Koresha umwirondoro w'ijwi wihariye ku butumwa bwawe.

Hitamo ijwi kugira ngo ugenzure uburyo bwo kwandika, uburyo busanzwe, n'imico.

Riguma rikora kugeza rihinduwe cyangwa rikuweho.

enterExamplesPlaceholder: Tanga umwandiko w'urugero werekana iri jwi

webSearch.title: Uburyo bwo Gushakisha ku Rubuga

webSearch.quickAccessInstructions: Kanda buto ya + hafi y'aho wandika ikiganiro ‚Üí Hitamo "Gushakisha ku Rubuga"

webSearch.privacyFocusedDescription: Igishakwa gusa ni cyo coherezwa hanze
webSearch.azureAIFoundryDescription: Byihuse, ariko ikiganiro cyose kibitswe hanze
webSearch.learnMore: Menya byinshi ku buryo bwo gushakisha ‚Üí

tones.title: Amajwi (Umwirondoro w'Ijwi)
tones.description: Genzura uburyo bwo kwandika bwa AI, uburyo busanzwe, n'imico
tones.createTonesInstructions: Ibikorwa Byihuse mu murongo w'uruhande ‚Üí Urupapuro rw'Amajwi
tones.useTonesInstructions: Kanda ahitamwo ijwi hafi y'aho wandika ikiganiro

aiAssist.title: Ubufasha bwa AI ku Mabwiriza n'Amajwi
aiAssist.description: Reka AI iguhe ubufasha mu gukora amabwiriza n'amajwi byiza byihuse
aiAssist.step1: Fungura Ibikorwa Byihuse mu murongo w'uruhande
aiAssist.getSuggestionsDesc: AI isesengura umwandiko wawe itanga ibyiza
aiAssist.buildFromFilesDesc: Ohereza inyandiko kugira ngo ukore amabwiriza/amajwi
aiAssist.testBeforeSavingDesc: Gerageza amabwiriza/amajwi mu kiganiro cyo kureba

customAgents.title: Abahagararizi Bihariye
customAgents.description: Abahagararizi ba AI bihariye bafite ubushobozi bwiyongereye nko gushakisha ku rubuga no gusobanura kode
customAgents.advancedFeatureDesc: Abahagararizi Bihariye bakora kuri Azure AI Foundry n'ibikoresho bihariye. Bisaba gukorana n'itsinda ry'ikoranabuhanga rya AI Assistant kugira ngo bakore indangamuntu z'abahagararizi.
customAgents.selectFromDropdown: Hitamo abahagararizi bihariye mu gutonyanga modeli

audioTranslation.title: Kwandika Amajwi n'Ubuhinduzi
audioTranslation.description: Guhindura ubwandiko bw'amajwi mu ndimi 13+ byikora
audioTranslation.step2: Kanda ahitamwo ururimi mu igishushanyo cy'ubwandiko

languageSupport.title: Indimi 54 Zishyigikiwe
languageSupport.description: Ubu ziboneka mu ndimi 54 kugira ngo amatsinda menshi ya MSF n'imiryango bashobore gukoresha AI Assistant mu rurimi rwabo
languageSupport.autoDetect: Ururimi rwawe rumenywa byikora uhereye ku igenamiterere rya mushakisha wawe
languageSupport.manualSwitch: Hindura igihe icyo ari cyo cyose binyuze mu guhitamo ururimi mu murongo w'uruhande

pwa.title: Shyiraho nka Porogaramu y'Igendanwa
pwa.description: Progressive Web App ifite uburambe busanzwe
pwa.installTip: Icyitonderwa: Shyiraho nyuma yo kwinjira kugira ngo ubike kwemeza kwawe kandi ubone uburambe bwiza.
pwa.step2: Fungura Igenamiterere ‚Üí Porogaramu y'Igendanwa kugira ngo ubone amabwiriza arambuye
pwa.step3: Ku igendanwa: Kanda menyo ya mushakisha (‚ãÆ cyangwa ‚öôÔ∏è)
pwa.step4: Shakisha "Ongeraho ku Cyerekanwa cy'Ibanze" cyangwa "Shyiraho Porogaramu"
pwa.benefit1: Tangira nka porogaramu isanzwe uhereye ku cyerekanwa cy'ibanze
pwa.benefit2: Ikuzimu yose nta gishushanyo cya mushakisha

terms.aiTranslationNotice: Ubu ni ubuhinduzi bwa AI bwatanzwe kugira ngo buguhe ubufasha mu gusobanukirwa n'amategeko. Amategeko y'amasezerano aboneka mu Cyongereza n'Igifaransa gusa.

auth.signInWithMsfAccount: Injira ukoresheje konti yawe ya msf.org
auth.accessLimitedText: Kugeza ubu MSF AI Assistant iboneka gusa ku bakozi ba USA, Amsterdam, na Geneva.
auth.errorConfiguration: Hari ikibazo mu igenamiterere rya seriveri.
auth.errorVerification: Ikimenyetso cyo kwemeza cyarangiye cyangwa cyarakoreshejwe.
auth.errorConfigurationServer: Hari ikibazo mu igenamiterere rya seriveri yo kwemeza.
auth.errorAccessDeniedPermissions: Ububasha bwanzwe. Nyamuneka reba uburenganzira bwawe.
auth.errorOAuthSignin: Ntushobora kwiyunga na serivisi yo kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorOAuthCallback: Ntushobora kurangiza kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorOAuthCreateAccount: Ntushobora gufungura konti. Nyamuneka hamagara ubufasha.
auth.errorEmailCreateAccount: Ntushobora gufungura konti. Nyamuneka hamagara ubufasha.
auth.errorCallback: Gusubiza ukwemeza byanze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorOAuthAccountNotLinked: Iyi konti isanzwe ihuye n'undi mukoresha.
auth.errorCredentialsSignin: Kwinjira byanze. Nyamuneka reba ibimenyetso byawe.
auth.errorSessionRequired: Nyamuneka injira kugira ngo ugere kuri iyi paji.
auth.errorSessionExpired: Igihe cyawe cyarangiye. Nyamuneka ongere winjire kugira ngo ukomeze.
auth.errorFallback: Ntushobora kwiyunga na serivisi yo kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze cyangwa uhamagare ubufasha niba ikibazo gikomeje.

help.title: Ikigo cy'Ubufasha
help.subtitle: Shaka ibisubizo, menya ku bijyanye n'ibanga, kandi ubone ubufasha

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.description: Shaka ibisubizo ku bibazo bisanzwe bijyanye no gukoresha AI Assistant

privacy.title: Ibanga n'Amakuru
privacy.description: Menya uburyo amakuru yawe abitswe kandi arindwa
privacy.noResults: Nta nsanganyamatsiko z'ibanga zihura n'ubushakashatsi bwawe
privacy.bannerDescription: Ibiganiro byose bibitswe ku gikoresho cyawe. Gutunganya amakuru bikora mu buryo bwa MSF ukoresheje ibikoresho bya Azure.

contact.title: Guhamagara n'Ibikoresho
contact.description: Vugana n'itsinda ryacu kandi ugere ku mahuza afasha
contact.requestDescription: Ukeneye ubufasha cyangwa ushaka gutanga ibitekerezo? Kanda hasi kugira ngo ufungure ifishi y'ubufasha bwacu.
contact.emailDescription: Duhereze imeri ku bibazo, ibitekerezo, cyangwa ibibazo by'ikoranabuhanga

resources.title: Ibikoresho Byongerewe
resources.githubDescription: Reba kode, tanga ibibazo, kandi utange ku GitHub

support.organizationDescription: Hitamo umuryango wawe wa MSF kugira ngo urebe umuyoboro w'ubufasha ukwiye
support.escalationTitle: Abakozi ba MSF bo mu Butumire n'Abandi
support.escalationDescription: Kurikira inzira yo gukuza ibibazo by'ikoranabuhanga y'umuryango wawe kugira ngo ubone ubufasha
support.escalationStep1: Hamagara ubufasha bw'ikoranabuhanga bw'aho hantu mbere
support.escalationStep2: Niba bidasobanuka, kuza ku ishami ry'ikoranabuhanga ry'Ikigo cy'Ibikorwa (OC)
support.escalationStep3: Niba bitarasobanuka, IT ya OC ishobora kukuza kuri SITS (Serivisi z'Ikoranabuhanga Zisangiye)

settings.Model Response Settings Description: Tegura ibipimo bisanzwe ku bisubizo bya modeli ya AI. Modeli zitandukanye zikoresha igenamiterere ritandukanye.
settings.reasoningEffortDescription: Igenzura ubujyanama bwo gutekereza kwa modeli zitekereza. Imbaraga nyinshi zitanga isesengura ryuzuye.
settings.verbosityDescription: Igenzura urwego rw'ibisobanuro by'igisubizo ku modeli za GPT-5.
settings.Controls how smoothly text appears durin: Igenzura uburyo umwandiko ugaragara neza mu gihe cy'ibisubizo bya AI
settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusubiza igenamiterere ryose? Ibi bizasubiza indangagaciro zisanzwe z'ubushyuhe, insanganyamatsiko, n'ibindi bihitamo. Ibiganiro byawe, amabwiriza, n'amajwi ntibizagirwa ingaruka.
settings.storageAlmostFull: Ububiko buregerejee kwuzura! Tekereza gusiba ibiganiro bishaje.
settings.backupDescription: Kora kopi yuzuye y'amakuru yawe yose harimo ibiganiro, amabwiriza, amajwi, ububiko, n'igenamiterere.
settings.clearDataWarning: Siba amateka yose y'ibiganiro mu bubiko bw'aho hantu. Ibi ntbishobora gusubizwa.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Shyira hamwe amabwiriza yawe, amajwi, ububiko, n'abahagararizi bihariye mu idosiye isangirwa abandi banyamuryango b'itsinda bashobora kwinjiza.
settings.Display Name Description: Hitamo uburyo izina ryawe rigaragara mu ndamutso n'ahandi hose muri porogaramu
settings.displayNameUIOnly: Ibi bigenzura uburyo izina ryawe rigaragara muri porogaramu. AI ntibona ibi keretse ufungure gusangira mu Igenamiterere ry'Ibiganiro.
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Shakisha iyi kode QR n'igikoresho cyawe cy'igendanwa kugira ngo utangire gushyiraho
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Koresha porogaramu mu buryo butaziguye uhereye ku cyerekanwa cyawe cy'ibanze
settings.PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ugomba gukoresha mushakisha wa Safari kuri iOS - Chrome n'abandi bashakisha ntibashyigikira gushyiraho porogaramu za rubuga kuri iOS.
settings.PWA Install Tip: üí° Icyitonderwa: Nyuma yo gushyiraho, ushobora gutangiza porogaramu uhereye ku cyerekanwa cy'ibanze nka porogaramu isanzwe - nta mushakisha ukenewe!
settings.PWA Note: Icyitonderwa: Iyi ni Progressive Web App (PWA). Ishyirwaho nka porogaramu isanzwe ariko ikora binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga rya mushakisha wawe. Amakuru yawe yose aguma ari ibanga kandi yizewe ku gikoresho cyawe.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Menya byinshi ku bijyanye na Progressive Web Apps
settings.Delete legacy data after migration: Siba amakuru yashaje nyuma yo kwimura
settings.legacyDataDescription: Ufite amakuru {size} y'uva kuri verisiyo ya mbere. Ashobora kwimurwa, koherezwa, cyangwa gusibwa kugira ngo ubone umwanya.
settings.legacyDeleteSuccess: Amakuru yashaje yasibwe neza kandi umwanya {size} warekuwe.
settings.legacyDeleteError: Gusiba amakuru yashaje byanze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
settings.deleteLegacyConfirm: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba amakuru yashaje yose? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwa.

aboutYou.title: Ibyerekeye Wowe
aboutYou.shareBasicInfoDescription: Iyo bifunguye, AI izamenya izina ryawe, umwanya, n'ishami uhereye ku mwirondoro wawe
aboutYou.preferredNameDescription: Hindura izina rigaragara. Reka ubusa kugira ngo ukoreshe izina ry'umwirondoro wawe
aboutYou.preferredNameDescriptionWithSync: Uburyo AI izakwita. Reka ubusa kugira ngo ukoreshe izina rigaragara rya Igenamiterere Rusange.
aboutYou.additionalContextPlaceholder: Urugero, Nkora mu bikorwa byo ku butumire, nshima ibisubizo bifatanyije, nkunze kubaza ku mabwiriza y'ubuvuzi...
aboutYou.additionalContextDescription: Andi makuru yose ushaka ko AI imenya kuwe

tts.title: Umwandiko-ku-Ijwi
tts.qualityDescription: Ubwiza bwinshi bukora amajwi meza ariko bukoresha umurongo munini
tts.previewText: Ibi ni ukureba igenamiterere ry'ijwi ryahisemo.
tts.noVoicesAvailable: Nta majwi aboneka ku ruru rurimi
tts.overrideForThisMessage: Hindura igenamiterere ku butumwa bwa hano

emptyState.changeDisplayName: Kanda kugira ngo uhindure uburyo tukwita

createDiagrams.title: Kora Amashusho
createDiagrams.prompt: Nyereka uburyo ushobora gukora amashusho n'ibishushanyo by'inzira. Ni ubuhe buryo, inzira z'ibikorwa, cyangwa sisitemu ushobora kumfasha kwerekana? Mpa ingero.

draftContent.title: Andika Ibikubiyemo by'Umwuga
draftContent.prompt: Nkeneye ubufasha bwo kwandika inyandiko z'umwuga - imeri, raporo, incamake. Ushobora kunyereka ingero z'uburyo ushobora gufasha mu bwoko butandukanye bwo kwandika ubucuruzi?

analyzeInformation.title: Sesengura Amakuru
analyzeInformation.prompt: Ushobora kumfasha nte gusesengura amakuru? Nyereka inzira zitandukanye ushobora gukurikiza mu gusesengura imibare, kubona imiterere, cyangwa gukurura ibitekerezo mu nyandiko cyangwa amakuru.

planOrganize.title: Gutegura & Gutunganya
planOrganize.prompt: Ushobora kumfasha gutegura imishinga cyangwa gutunganya akazi? Mpa ingero z'uburyo ushobora gukora inzira z'igihe, gahunda, cyangwa imishinga y'imiterere itandukanye.

brainstormIdeas.title: Gushakisha Ibitekerezo
brainstormIdeas.prompt: Nshaka gushakisha ibisubizo ku kibazo. Nyereka uburyo ugera ku gutekereza bishya no gutanga ibitekerezo - ni ibihe bibazo wakabaza kandi uburyo ushakisha amahirwe?

buildPresentations.title: Kora Iyerekwa
buildPresentations.prompt: Ushobora kumfasha nte gukora iyerekwa? Nyereka ingero z'imiterere itandukanye y'iyerekwa, ibitekerezo by'amashusho, n'uburyo utunganya amakuru ku bantu batandukanye.

workWithCode.title: Gukora na Kode
workWithCode.prompt: Ushobora gufasha mu kwandika kode cyangwa gahunda? Nyereka ingero - yaba ari kwandika kode nshya, gukosora ibibazo, cyangwa gusobanura uburyo ikintu gikora intambwe ku yindi.

decisionSupport.title: Ubufasha mu Gufata Ibyemezo
decisionSupport.prompt: Nkeneye gufata icyemezo ariko sinzi uburyo nsesenguye amahitamo yanjye. Ushobora kunyereka inzira cyangwa uburyo butandukanye ukoresha kugira ngo ufashe gutekereza ku mahitamo?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Gukora Incamake no Guhuza
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: Ufasha ute mu gukora incamake y'inyandiko ndende cyangwa guhuza amakuru aturuka ku nkomoko nyinshi? Nyereka ingero z'imiterere itandukanye y'incamake n'urwego rw'ibisobanuro.

explainTopics.title: Sobanura Insanganyamatsiko Zigoye
explainTopics.prompt: Ushobora gusobanura ibitekerezo bigoye mu magambo yoroshye? Nyereka uburyo ugabanya ibitekerezo bigoye, ukoresha imigereranya, kandi uhindure ibisobanuro ku rwego rw'ubumenyi butandukanye.

createSchedules.title: Kora Gahunda
createSchedules.prompt: Nkeneye ubufasha bwo gutunganya igihe no gukora gahunda. Nyereka inzira zitandukanye ushobora gutunganya gahunda, karendari, cyangwa imishinga ishingiye ku gihe hamwe n'ingero.

agents.description: Kora kandi ucunge abahagararizi ba AI bihariye bafite ubushobozi budasanzwe. Aba bahagararizi bakora ku ikigo rya MSF AI Assistant Foundry.
agents.advancedFeatureTitle: Ibiranga by'Inzobere - Bisaba Gukorana n'Itsinda ry'Ikoranabuhanga rya AI Assistant
agents.advancedFeatureWarning: Abahagararizi bihariye bakora gusa n'ikigo rya MSF AI Assistant Foundry. Indangamuntu z'abahagararizi zigomba gukorwa n'itsinda ry'ikoranabuhanga rya AI Assistant muri iki kigo kandi muhuze mbere yo gukoresha.
agents.noAgentsDescription: Kora umuhagararizi wawe wa mbere wihariye kugira ngo wongere ubushobozi bwa AI n'ibikoresho n'imyitwarire bidasanzwe.

advancedOptions.title: Amahitamo y'Inzobere
advancedOptions.fixedTemperatureNote: Icyitonderwa: Iyi modeli ikoresha indangagaciro z'ubushyuhe zihamye ku mikorere ihamye.

searchMode.title: Uburyo bwo Gushakisha
searchMode.subtitle: Bizakoresha gushakisha ku rubuga bibaye ngombwa
searchMode.azureAgentModeDescription: Byihuse ariko bibika amakuru y'ikiganiro mu bicu
searchMode.privacyInfoDescription: Ikiganiro cyawe cyose kizohererezwa umuhagararizi wa Azure AI Foundry.

customAgent.label: Umuhagararizi Wihariye:
customAgent.description: Uyu muhagararizi akora ku ikigo rya MSF AI Assistant Foundry n'ibikoresho bifunguye buri gihe.
customAgent.webSearch: Gushakisha ku rubuga mu gihe nyacyo

knowledgeCutoff.realtime: Gushakisha ku rubuga mu gihe nyacyo

modelTypeIcons.foundational: Modeli yihuse kandi ikora neza igenewe byose
modelTypeIcons.omni: Modeli y'uburyo bwinshi ifite ubushobozi bugari
modelTypeIcons.agent: Umuhagararizi ufite ibikoresho byo mu gihe nyacyo n'ubushobozi bwa rubuga

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: Modeli ya AI ikoreshwa na GPT-4.1 ifite gushakisha ku rubuga mu gihe nyacyo binyuze muri Bing. Itanga amakuru mashya, kugenzura ukuri, n'ubumenyi ku bikorwa bigezweho. Nziza cyane ku bushakashatsi bukeneye amakuru mashya, isesengura ry'amakuru, no kugenzura ukuri.
gpt_4_1.knowledgeCutoff: Gushakisha ku rubuga mu gihe nyacyo

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: Modeli ya OpenAI ifite ubushobozi bwinshi cyane, yizewe mu gutekereza bigoye, gukora kode, no gukemura ibibazo by'ikoranabuhanga. Nziza cyane ku mirimo yo gusesengura, ibibazo by'iprogramu, ubushakashatsi, n'ibisobanuro birambuye. Ishyigikira imbaraga zo gutekereza n'ubusobanuro bw'igisubizo bihinduka.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Verisiyo yihuse kandi irimo byinshi ya GPT-5, yanonosoye ku muvuduko ikomeje ubwiza bwinshi. Nziza ku mirimo ya buri munsi, ibibazo byihuse, n'iporogaramu zikeneye ibisubizo byihuse. Igereranya neza imikorere n'ubushobozi.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: Modeli ya OpenAI yo gutekereza ifite ubushobozi bwinshi cyane mu gukemura ibibazo. Yizewe mu mibare igoye, gutekereza mu bumenyi, ibibazo bya kode, n'imirimo y'igenamiterere rya logike. Idirishya ry'umwandiko ry'200K. Ishyigikira kugenzura imbaraga zo gutekereza.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Modeli yihuse kandi irimo byinshi iturutse kuri Meta. Nziza ku mirimo ya buri munsi nko kwandika, gukora incamake, n'ubufasha bwa kode y'ibanze. Igereranya neza umuvuduko n'ubwiza ku mirimo isanzwe.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Inzobere mu gutekereza yerekana imikorere yayo intambwe ku yindi. Nziza cyane ku bibazo by'imibare, ibibazo bya logike, no gusobanukirwa n'ibitekerezo bigoye. Reba uburyo itekereza ku bibazo mu gihe nyacyo.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Modeli ikomeye igenewe byose, yizewe cyane mu kwandika kode n'inyandiko z'ikoranabuhanga. Nziza mu gukosora kode, kwandika inyandiko, no gusobanura ibitekerezo by'ikoranabuhanga. Yihuse kandi yizewe ku mirimo y'iterambere.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Modeli ifite ubushobozi bwinshi iturutse kuri xAI yizwi n'ibisubizo byimbitse. Nziza ku biganiro bifunguye, imishinga y'ubuhanga, no gukemura ibibazo bigoye.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Modeli ya Anthropic ifite ubushobozi bwinshi cyane n'ubuhanga budasanzwe mu gutekereza, kwandika kode, n'ibihanga. Nziza cyane ku isesengura rigoye, ubushakashatsi, n'imirimo isaba gusobanukirwa birambuye.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Modeli ya Claude igereranijwe itanga imikorere nziza mu kwandika kode, isesengura, n'imirimo y'ubuhanga. Nziza ku mikoreshereze ya buri munsi n'ibisubizo byihuse.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Modeli ya Claude Opus y'ikiremwamuntu cyabanje. Nziza cyane ku mirimo igoye ya kode, isesengura rirambuye, no gusobanukirwa n'ibintu byimbitse.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Modeli ya Claude yihuse kandi irimo byinshi yanonosoye ku mirimo yihuse. Nziza ku bibazo byoroheje, gukora incamake, n'iporogaramu z'uburebure bunini.

searchMode.title: Uburyo bwo Gushakisha Bwasobanuwe
searchMode.subtitle: Gusobanukirwa n'amahitamo yawe yo gushakisha n'aho amakuru yawe abitswe
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Ibisubizo byihuse cyane nta bushobozi bwo gushakisha ku rubuga. Ikiganiro cyawe cyose kiguma mu mushakisha wawe - nta kintu kibitswe mu bicu.
searchMode.viewDetailsBelow: Kugira ngo ubone ibisobanuro byinshi, reba inzira y'ikoranabuhanga hepfo.
searchMode.legendNoSearch: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho hantu) | Seriveri ya AI Assistant | Azure OpenAI (nta by'ububiko)
searchMode.privacyDescription: Ikoresha gushakisha ku rubuga bibaye ngombwa ariko buhoro kuko intambwe nyinshi zirebwa. Ibyo washakishije gusa ni byo bibitswe muri Azure - ikiganiro cyawe cyose kiguma mu mushakisha wawe.
searchMode.legendPrivacy: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho hantu) | Seriveri ya AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry (ibyo washakishije gusa) | Azure OpenAI (nta by'ububiko)
searchMode.foundryDescription: Ibisubizo byihuse hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo gushakisha ku rubuga bushyizwemo. Ikiganiro cyawe cyose kibitswe mu idatabaze ya Azure AI Foundry, atari mu mushakisha wawe gusa.
searchMode.legendFoundry: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho hantu) | Seriveri ya AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry Agent (ibika ikiganiro cyose)
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: Aya ni amahitamo y'uburyo bwo gushakisha buboneka nyuma y'aho Azure yahagaritse Bing Search API yabo, iyo AI Assistant yabanjirije koresha.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: Itsinda ririmo gushakisha amahitamo yo gushakisha arinda ibanga kurushaho. Amahitamo yombi akoresha ubushobozi bwo gushakisha bwa Azure AI Foundry ariko atandukanira ku bwinshi bw'amakuru y'ikiganiro asangirwa.
searchMode.azureDeprecatedBingApi: Azure yahagaritse Bing Search API yabo
searchMode.footerNote: Uburyo bwombi bubika ikiganiro cyawe ku gikoresho cyawe mu mushakisha. Ushobora guhindura uburyo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose mu igenamiterere rya modeli.

descriptions.foundLegacyData: Twabonye amakuru y'uva kuri verisiyo ya mbere. Urashaka kuyimura kugira ngo akore na sisitemu yanonosoye?
descriptions.storageSpaceWarning: Amakuru yawe akeneye umwanya munini kuruta uboneka ubu. Tugusabye gukoresha uburyo bwo kwimura buhoro.
descriptions.pleaseWait: Nyamuneka tegereza turimo kuvugurura amakuru yawe...
descriptions.dataIsSafe: Amakuru yawe ya mbere ni mazima. Ushobora kugerageza ukundi cyangwa urenze ubu.
descriptions.itemsTooLarge: Ibi bintu ni binini cyane kugira ngo bikwire mu bubiko. Ushobora kubisohereza, gufungura umwanya, cyangwa gukomeza udafite.

options.deleteLegacyData: Siba amakuru yashaje nyuma yo kwimura

message.warning: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buri ku {percent}% y'ubushobozi.
message.critical: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buri ku rwego rw'akaga ku {percent}% y'ubushobozi.
message.emergency: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buregerejee kwuzura busesuye ku {percent}%!

storageWarning.consequence: Ububiko nubuzura, ushobora gutakaza ubushobozi bwo kubona ibiganiro bishya kandi porogaramu ishobora guhagarika gukora neza.

confirm.title: Emeza Gusiba
confirm.message: Ibi bizasiba ibiganiro {count} burundu. Ibi ntbishobora gusubizwa.

error.title: Gusiba Byanze
error.message: Habaye ikosa mu gusiba ibiganiro. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

fileUpload.failedToOpenInEditor: Gufungura idosiye mu guhindura kode byanze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

artifact.editsNotSaved: Impinduka ntizabitswe. Ohereza binyuze mu butumwa cyangwa umanure kugira ngo ubike impinduka.

codeEditor.startTyping: Tangira kwandika cyangwa usabe AI gukora kode
codeEditor.codeWillSync: Kode izihuzanya byikora iturutse ku butumwa bw'ikiganiro

dropdown.searchTooltip:
Fungura gushakisha ku rubuga ku butumwa bwose.

Bitanga amakuru mashya ukoresheje Bing mu gihe nyacyo.
dropdown.attachTooltip:
Shyiraho amadosiye, amashusho, cyangwa amajwi/videwo.

Imiterere yemewe:
‚Ä¢ Amashusho: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (5MB ntarengwa, kugeza 10)
‚Ä¢ Inyandiko: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, MD (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Amakuru: CSV, JSON, XML, YAML (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Kode: PY, JS, TS, JAVA, C, CPP, GO, nibindi (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Amajwi/Videwo: MP3, WAV, MP4, WebM (25MB ntarengwa, idosiye 1)

Igiteranyo: amadosiye 10, 50MB ntarengwa
dropdown.transcribeTooltip:
Ohereza amadosiye y'amajwi cyangwa videwo yo kwandika.

Imiterere yemewe: MP3, MP4, WAV, WebM, M4A, MPEG, MPGA
Ingano ntarengwa: 25MB

Kwandika bikora byikora iyo wohereje ubutumwa.
dropdown.selectToneDescription: Hitamo umwirondoro w'ijwi ku butumwa bwawe
dropdown.translateDocumentTooltip:
Hindura inyandiko mu rundi rurimi.

Imiterere yemewe: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, HTML, TXT
Ingano ntarengwa: 40MB

Bishyigikira indimi 80+ hamwe n'amadosiye y'amagambo ntibisabwa.

transcription.instructionsPlaceholder: Ibyerekezo byo kunoza ubunyangamugayo (urugero, amazina, amagambo)
transcription.maxDurationNote: Amadosiye manini ashobora gufata kugeza iminota {minutes}
transcription.fetchError: Gutangira ubwandiko byanze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
transcription.transcriptExpired: Ubwandiko bwa {filename} bwarangiye. Ubwandiko busibwa byikora nyuma y'iminsi {days} ku mpamvu z'ibanga.
transcription.expirationWarning: Ubwandiko bwa {filename} buzarangira mu minsi {days}. Kopiya ibikubiyemo niba ukeneye kubibika.

documentTranslation.title: Ubuhinduzi bw'Inyandiko
documentTranslation.glossaryHelp: Ohereza idosiye y'amagambo ya CSV, TSV, cyangwa XLIFF ku magambo yihariye.
documentTranslation.glossaryTooLarge: Idosiye y'amagambo ni nini cyane. Ingano ntarengwa ni {maxSize}.
documentTranslation.documentTooLarge: Inyandiko ni nini cyane. Ingano ntarengwa ni {maxSize}.

customAgents.title: Abahagararizi Bihariye
customAgents.experimentalBlurb: Igeragezwa ‚Äî byubatswe mu gukorana gutaziguye n'abakoresha bakomeye ba MSF. Ntibigenewe gukoresha rusange.

agentsTab.selectAgentPrompt: Hitamo umuhagararizi kugira ngo urebe ibisobanuro

privacy.policyDescription: Menya uburyo amakuru yawe arindwa n'amakuru adakwiye kwinjizwa
privacy.termsDescription: Suzuma amabwiriza y'imikoreshereze ifite icyizere n'imikoreshereze ibujijwe
privacy.localStorage: Ibiganiro byawe bibitswe ku gikoresho cyawe
privacy.azureInfra: Gutunganya amakuru byose bikora mu buryo bwa MSF ukoresheje ibikoresho bya Azure
privacy.noPersonalData: Ntiwinjize amakuru bwite (amazina, nimero za telefone, nibindi)
privacy.contactUs: Duhamagare ako kanya niba ufite ibibazo by'ibanga:

variableModal.fillInstructions: Uzuza impinduka zikurikira kugira ngo uhindure ibwiriza ryawe

chatInput.filePickerError: Ntibashije gufungura igihitamo cy'idosiye. Gerageza gukoresha gukurura no gurekura.
